title: Dahlia

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You may inspect a player during the day.
- Choose another two players to watch at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot inspect or watch the first Day/Night.
- You will attack your day target if they visit either of your night targets.
- You may watch yourself.
- When dead, you may choose a player at night to deliver a Basic Attack to them. (single use)

fields.name: Notifications:
fields.value:
You have decided to inspect (player)."
"(player1) did not visit (player2)."
"You successfully attacked (player1)!"
"Your target's defense was too strong to kill."
"You could not inspect your target because they were jailed."
"You have decided to attack (player)."
"You only watched one of your targets because the other was jailed."

"You were slashed by a Dahlia!"
"They were slashed by a Dahlia."

desc:
Post 155
*You are an ancient warrior who has returned for her people.*
